duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead or actively contribute to the architecture, design, implementation, and delivery of a multi-modal perception system.
Build software infrastructure for learning algorithms to leverage large scale image/LIDAR data.
Design and write highly optimized pipelines for data pre-processing, model training, data post-processing, inferencing etc.
Train perception models, evaluate their performance, investigate and fix performance bottlenecks.
Develop scalable training and evaluation tools and infrastructure.
Collaborate with other engineers to conduct system integration and tests.

education_certification.credential: Masters’ or Ph.D. degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Robotics or related field
